thread.title: VA SAR Underwriter at Cybercoders (Trenton, NJ)
thread.title_full: VA SAR Underwriter at Cybercoders (Trenton, NJ)

title: VA SAR Underwriter at Cybercoders (Trenton, NJ)
text: Source: CyberCoders VA SAR Underwriter If you are an FHA DE and VA SAR Underwriter with 3+ years of recent underwriting experience, please read on! We are a bank actively building a residential mortgage lending program in several niche government loan markets, including FHA HECM, 203K, Title I and VA loan products. As a federal savings bank, we are actively originating loans in all 50 states and US territories. Establishing and maintaining relationships with our customers, employees, and communities is at the core of everything we do. Join us as we provide our customers and prospective customers with solutions, not just products. We believe in teamwork and empowering high performers who are committed to our mission while achieving personal and professional success. We are in the process of establishing an East-Coast back-office for our forward mortgage production. If you are interested in working with a "tight-knit" group and do not want to get "lost in the shuffle", go ahead and apply! Top Reasons to Work with Us 401K Career Growth Flexibility What You Will Be Doing Underwriting VA loans to start and adding FHA as our clients need us to. What You Need for this Position Requirements: - 3+ years underwriting government loans Bonus Points For: - Bachelor's Degree - Calyx Point - Encompass Banker What's In It for You 401K Career Growth Flexibility So, if you are a DE Underwriter with 3+ years of experience, please apply today! - Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work – In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
